title: Looking for a Serif Small Caps With a Swash R
content:
Hello there.

In search of a simple and elegant typeface (like Anziano SC) that has  
an R whose tail swoops down below the baseline.

Any ideas?

Thanks in advance,

BT
author: mediumbold

comments.content:
Nick Cooke's Organon Serif has one  
 [http://www.type.co.uk/a\_to\_z/id/35851](http://web.archive.org/web/20130703205854/http:/www.type.co.uk/a_to_z/id/35851 "http://www.type.co.uk/a\_to\_z/id/35851")

Jupiter from Canada Type has many swashy caps, including a down-swooping "R":  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jupiter-pro/pro/characters.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130703205854/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jupiter-pro/pro/characters.html "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jupiter-pro/pro/characters.html")
